item.description:
We're moving to dinner from ice cream, and into Harvard Square this week. Come to Wagamama, on JFK street just south of the T station.

We will also be meeting two weeks from now, for dinner somewhere else... recommendations welcome. Since some people can't make Monday, we may try for that Tuesday.

Potential topics of discussion:
* Wikipedia and truth (and Garfinkels)
* Wikipedia editing in Latin America (updates from Peru and Chile)
* Wikimedia chapters in the western hemisphere; and forming US Wikipedia groups
* Organizing Wiki-intros at local universities and libraries
* Winter wiki-day with speakers from around the country
* Other free knowledge projects underway : CK12, Derechos Digitales, resource.org
* The million-book public library and wikibooks
* Offline Wikipedia, OLPC, and implications for taking your wiki with you
* Travel Scholarships to Wikimania 2008 in Buenos Aires


Autumnal warmth,
SJ
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be in black and a fake Peruvian fedora at the large table in the back.
item.name: The Boston Wikipedia November Meetup
